metadata: (info { (description "Bul is a game played in the Maya area by men, and which plays an important role in the Vigil of the Maize ceremony. It is a race game that involves capturing and stacking.") (rules "Six or more players (even number), played on two teams. The games Aj Sayil, Aj T'iwil, Aj Sina'anil, Aj Sakakil, and A K'aak'il are played in succession.") (source "Verbeeck 1998: 87-90.") (id "327") (version "1.3.14") (classification "board/war/replacement/eliminate/all") } )
